amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 213 which prohibits funds in the bill from being used to conduct a public-private competition for work performed by employees of the Bureau of Prisons or Federal Prison Industries, Incorporated.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 213.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 162 - 267 (Roll no. 729).
